asset.name: Embraer Phenom 300E
asset.description: Long-range single-pilot jet, with a maximum range of 2,010 nautical miles. It seats six to 10 passengers.

asset.description: Single-pilot plane that seats up to 10 passengers.

asset.name: HondaJet HA-420
asset.description: One of the smallest and lightest jets around with enhanced efficiency.

asset.name: Cirrus Vision Jet
asset.description: Includes a Cirrus Airframe Parachute System (CAPS).
